## IIcon.initView() method

Creates the SVG elements for the icon that will live on the block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
initView(pointerdownListener: (e: PointerEvent) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pointerdownListener | (e: PointerEvent) =&gt; void | An event listener that must be attached to the root SVG element by the implementation of <code>initView</code>. Used by Blockly's gesture system to properly handle clicks and drags. |

**Returns:**

void
